title: Online Simulation-Based Peer Assessment Learning Course in Mathematics

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts (equations, functions, statistics) and basic smartphone proficiency
context.additional_context: Peer assessment-centered mathematics learning program for medium-sized learner groups in vocational training institutions, conducted in smartphone-based educational environments, focusing on enhancing mathematical thinking and metacognitive skills through formative assessments

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more mathematical problem-solving strategies through peer assessment processes
Learners can analyze peers' problem-solving processes using VR simulations and provide structured feedback five or more times
Learners can systematically reflect on their learning processes over eight weeks by writing metacognitive journals

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
